solution_line_template: Amanda sells {tickets_per_friend} tickets to {num_friends} friends so she sells {tickets_per_friend} * {num_friends} = <<{tickets_per_friend}*{num_friends}={tickets_day1}>>{tickets_day1} tickets on her first day
On her second day, she sells {tickets_day2} tickets for a total of {tickets_day1} + {tickets_day2} = <<{tickets_day2}+{tickets_day1}={total_tickets_day2}>>{total_tickets_day2} Tickets so far

Having {goal_tickets} tickets as the goal, she needs to sell {goal_tickets} - {total_tickets_day2} = <<{goal_tickets}-{total_tickets_day2}={tickets_day3_needed}>>{tickets_day3_needed} Tickets on her last day
